meanings.sent1: The tubbers in our community take care of the potato plants.
meanings.sent2: Farmers are skilled tubbers who cultivate various types of tubers.
meanings.sent3: The tubbers had a friendly competition to see who could grow the largest potatoes.
meanings.sent4: She was a dedicated tubber, nurturing the tubers with love and care.
meanings.sent5: The young tubber proudly displayed the harvest of fresh tubers.

meanings.sent1: The tubbers in the garden are ready for harvest.
meanings.sent2: Potatoes are common tubbers grown in many regions.
meanings.sent3: The tubbers in the field seemed to be chatting with each other.
meanings.sent4: The tubber plant stood tall, showcasing its bountiful tubers.
meanings.sent5: The farmer carefully tended to the tubber, ensuring a good yield of tubers.

meanings.definition: A tool used for digging up tubers.
meanings.sent1: The farmer used a sturdy tubber to unearth the potatoes.
meanings.sent2: A tubber is essential for harvesting tubers efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The tubber slipped from his hand and landed in the mud.
meanings.sent4: With the trusty tubber in hand, the gardener began the harvest.
meanings.sent5: The old tubber had seen many seasons of tuber digging.
